translations.translation: This is the Hell that you were promised.
This is the Hell that you were promised.
Now this is the Hell of which you were warned.
This is hell with which you were threatened.
“This is hell, which you were promised.”
This is Hell which you were promised!
This is the hell with which you were threatened.
This is Gehenna, then, the same that you were promised;
This is hell which ye were promised (if ye followed him).
This is the Hell you were promised.
Yonder is Hell, which ye were promised.
This is the hell you had been promised!
This is the Hell of which ye were (repeatedly) warned!
This is Hell which you were promised!
This, then is Gehenna (Hell), that which you were promised.
This is Hellfire, which you were promised.
This is the Hellfire which you were promised.
[36:63] This is Hell, which you were promised!
(This is hell which you were promised) in the life of the world.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: وقيل لهم حينئذ مشيراً إلى منقبلهم ومثواهم: { هَـٰذِهِ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِي كُنتُمْ } أيها الضالون، الغاوون، المغرورون { تُوعَدُونَ } [يس: 63] في النشأة ا لأولى بألسنة الرسل والكتب
